description: I am a very communicative person, who is also easy going, caring. I love making presents to those I love and to surprise my dearest and nearest people in a good way, of course. I appreciate the beauty in everything: in people, in love, in nature, in the world around us, in arts, simply, in everything. I am also convinced that we have to accept other people just in a way they are, with their good sides and their flaws, because it is what they call pure and unconditional love.
